FuncDef: This command configures the number of consecutive SDP keepalive failed request attempts or remote replies that can be missed after which the SDP is operationally downed. If themax-drop-countconsecutive keepalive request messages cannot be sent or no replies are received, the SDP-ID will be brought operationally down by the keepalive SDP monitoring.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of consecutive SDP keepalive requests that are failed to be sent or replies missed, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 5.
